channel.title: Database on Shan's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Database on Shan's blog

item.title: Relational Databases and Normalization
item.description: Normalization forms the foundation of relational databases. In this article, we walk through an example, applying 1NF, 2NF, and 3NF step by step, illustrating how normalization guides the design of a well-structured relational table.
